thread.title: Custom Software Firm AgileThought Promotes Two Key Leaders to Vice President Steven Granese Named Vice President of Transform and Taylor Howard Named Vice President of Build

author: cnbc.com
title: Custom Software Firm AgileThought Promotes Two Key Leaders to Vice President Steven Granese Named Vice President of Transform and Taylor Howard Named Vice President of Build
text:
TAMPA, Fla., March 2, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- AgileThought, a national provider of custom software solutions and development consulting to Fortune 1000 clients, announced the promotion of Steven Granese to Vice President of the Transform practice and Taylor Howard to Vice President of the Build practice. In their new roles, each will spearhead the delivery and growth of the key services and solutions provided by AgileThought , which increased revenue by 60 percent in 2017.
CEO David Romine stated, "We are pleased to promote Steven and Taylor as their leadership continues to drive our mission of changing the way people and organizations envision, create and deliver software products. These new roles reflect a natural progression in our business as our service offerings have expanded to include new and innovative opportunities for our clients. The practices of Transform and Build align with the growing range of needs facing our enterprise clients."
Granese joined AgileThought as the Agile Practice Lead in 2016. In his new role, he will lead the transformational and agile consulting and coaching capabilities of AgileThought. "This is an exciting time in our industry as our teams assist the country's top companies in their evolution to be more innovative and effective, not only in how their IT organizations deliver software but in how they strategize, create and deliver solutions for their clients - driving real growth."
"As technologies and businesses increase in complexity, our goal is to be the trusted partner that continuously provides insightful thought leadership and the highest quality solutions and services," stated Howard, who joined AgileThought as the Analytics and Business Intelligence Practice Lead in 2014. In his new role, he will be responsible for the creation, delivery and implementation capabilities across AgileThought's technical teams.
AgileThought was recently named to the prestigious Inc. 5000 list for the tenth consecutive year. Fewer than half of one percent of Inc. 5000 honorees have ever achieved this milestone. The company has produced an average yearly revenue growth of 32 percent since its founding in 2004.
Follow AgileThought: LinkedIn, Twitter , Facebook
About AgileThought
AgileThought is a full-service software consulting firm with specializations in enterprise application development, digital and agile transformation and training, DevOps consulting and training, collaboration, SharePoint, data analytics, machine learning, artificial intelligence, and cloud solutions, and user interface and experience design. Formed in 2004, the company has been noted as one of the country's Best Companies to Work For by Fortune magazine. It is currently listed on the Inc. 5000 list for the tenth consecutive year and was also listed as one of the Best Company Cultures by Entrepreneur magazine. It serves Fortune 1000 clients nationwide from offices in Tampa, Atlanta, and Orlando. For more information, visit agilethought.com or call 1-877-514-9180.
